statements: SELECT * FROM game_level_data WHERE id = 1;
SELECT level_number FROM game_level_data WHERE level_number > 5;
SELECT id, level_data FROM game_level_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT level_number, id FROM game_level_data WHERE id = 3 OR level_number < 10;
SELECT * FROM game_level_data WHERE level_number BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM game_level_data WHERE level_number = 10;
SELECT level_number, level_data FROM game_level_data WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT id, level_number, level_data FROM game_level_data ORDER BY level_number DESC;
SELECT id, level_number FROM game_level_data WHERE level_number BETWEEN 5 AND 10;
SELECT * FROM game_level_data WHERE level_number > 5 AND level_number < 15 ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT * FROM level_data;
SELECT level_id, level_name FROM level_data ORDER BY level_id DESC;
SELECT tile_type, is_obstacle FROM tile_data WHERE is_obstacle = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM level_data WHERE difficulty > 3;
SELECT level_name FROM level_data WHERE level_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM level_data WHERE difficulty > 5;
SELECT level_name, difficulty FROM level_data WHERE level_id = 2;
SELECT level_id, level_name, difficulty FROM level_data ORDER BY difficulty DESC;
SELECT tile_type, is_obstacle FROM tile_data WHERE level_id = 1 ORDER BY tile_type ASC;
SELECT level_id, COUNT(tile_id) AS total_tiles FROM tile_data GROUP BY level_id HAVING total_tiles > 10;
SELECT * FROM game_levels;
SELECT level_seed, level_difficulty FROM game_levels WHERE level_difficulty > 3;
SELECT entity_name FROM level_entities WHERE level_id = 1;
SELECT tile_type, tile_positionX, tile_positionY FROM level_tiles WHERE level_id = 2 ORDER BY tile_positionY DESC;
SELECT entity_name, entity_health FROM level_entities WHERE entity_type = 'monster' ORDER BY entity_health DESC, entity_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM game_levels, level_tiles, level_entities WHERE game_levels.level_id = level_tiles.level_id AND game_levels.level_id = level_entities.level_id;
SELECT level_id, level_seed, level_difficulty FROM game_levels WHERE level_difficulty > 5;
SELECT entity_name, entity_type, entity_health FROM level_entities WHERE entity_health < 50;
SELECT tile_type, tile_positionX, tile_positionY FROM level_tiles WHERE tile_type = 'obstacle';

SELECT game_levels.level_id, level_tiles.tile_type, level_entities.entity_type FROM game_levels INNER JOIN level_tiles ON game_levels.level_id = level_tiles.level_id INNER JOIN level_entities ON game_levels.level_id = level_entities.level_id ORDER BY game_levels.level_id, level_entities.entity_type DESC;
SELECT * FROM GameLevels;
SELECT level_name, level_difficulty FROM GameLevels;
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM LevelPlayers WHERE level_id = 1;
SELECT enemy_type, enemy_strength FROM LevelEnemies WHERE level_id = 2;
SELECT item_name, item_type FROM LevelItems WHERE level_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM GameLevels WHERE level_difficulty > 3
SELECT player_name, player_score FROM LevelPlayers WHERE level_id = 1 ORDER BY player_score DESC
SELECT enemy_type, enemy_strength FROM LevelEnemies WHERE level_id = 2 AND enemy_strength BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT item_name FROM LevelItems WHERE level_id = 3 AND item_type = 'weapon'
SELECT level_id, level_name, level_difficulty FROM GameLevels WHERE level_difficulty < 2 ORDER BY level_name ASC
SELECT level_name, difficulty_level FROM GameLevels;
SELECT player_id, progress_status FROM PlayerProgress ORDER BY player_id DESC;
SELECT level_id, completion_time FROM LevelsCompleted WHERE level_id = 3;
SELECT enemy_name, enemy_strength FROM LevelEnemies WHERE enemy_strength > 50 ORDER BY enemy_strength ASC;
SELECT item_name, item_rarity FROM LootItems WHERE item_rarity = 'Legendary';
SELECT * FROM GameLevels WHERE difficulty_level > 3;
SELECT level_name, level_data FROM GameLevels WHERE level_id = 10 ORDER BY level_name DESC;
SELECT player_id, progress_status, level_name FROM PlayerProgress JOIN GameLevels ON PlayerProgress.level_id = GameLevels.level_id WHERE progress_status = 'Completed' ORDER BY player_id;
SELECT player_id, level_id, completion_time FROM LevelsCompleted WHERE player_id = 5 AND level_id = 3;
SELECT enemy_name, enemy_strength FROM LevelEnemies WHERE level_id IN (SELECT level_id FROM GameLevels WHERE difficulty_level < 5) ORDER BY enemy_strength DESC;
